article_title: Santa visits sick children at YRMC
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. og.description: Since some children were too sick to be home on Christmas, Santa Claus, with the help of the Yuma Police Department, decided to make a quick trip to Yuma Regional Medical Center on Thursday morning, where he dropped off their presents and spent time visiting with them.
